## Loading of Konstanz

```{r}
library(rdwd)
id = findID('Konstanz')
id
KN_pos = selectDWD(id=id, res='hourly',  per='recent', var='air_temperature') 
print(KN_pos)
KN_recent = dataDWD(KN_pos, read = TRUE, varnames=TRUE)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
plot(KN_recent$MESS_DATUM, KN_recent$TT_TU.Lufttemperatur, type='l', xlab='Time', ylab='Temperature (Â°C)')
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
